extendedInfo.description: *Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.--------A picture book about sharing cookies with your animal friends. By entering in your child's name and age, you can create a personalized story for your child in which they are the main character. An educational and fun app where your child has to make a connection between the number of animals and the number of cookies to give. The number of cookies can be set between 1 and 10. Target age: 2 to 6 years old Background Music: "Odekake biyori" provided by Amacha Music Studios.
